Headline: #48 South Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/47th
ShortDescription: 48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 51st, Ashland and 47th, due to street blockage near Damen/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, 51st, Ashland and 47th, due to street blockage near Damen/47th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Belmont/Neva
ShortDescription: Eastbound 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Harlem, Diversey, Oak Park and Belmont, due to street blockage near Belmont/Neva.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Harlem, Diversey, Oak Park and Belmont, due to street blockage near Belmont/Neva.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cicero due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cicero due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
